alignment_result.mapping_rationale: Financial transaction entity is domain-specific to banking sector with no equivalent in skill development domain
alignment_result.notes: Banking transaction is core entity in financial services, no overlap with skill development entities

alignment_result.mapping_rationale: Bank account entity is financial services specific, no equivalent in skill development domain
alignment_result.notes: Account management is specific to banking operations

alignment_result.mapping_rationale: Both are AI-powered systems, but serve completely different purposes - fraud detection vs skill development
alignment_result.notes: Shares AI/ML patterns but different functional domains

alignment_result.mapping_rationale: Payment network integration is banking-specific infrastructure with no skill development equivalent
alignment_result.notes: External payment network integration specific to financial services

alignment_result.mapping_rationale: Hardware Security Module is specialized cryptographic infrastructure not present in skill development domain
alignment_result.notes: Security infrastructure specific to financial transaction processing

alignment_result.mapping_rationale: Currency exchange functionality is banking-specific with no skill development analog
alignment_result.notes: Multi-currency processing specific to international banking operations

extracted_term.definition: Real-time process to approve or decline financial transactions within 150ms/300ms

alignment_result.notes: Financial transaction processing concept not present in skill development vocabulary

extracted_term.definition: Machine learning-based real-time evaluation of transaction risk with >99% accuracy

alignment_result.notes: Risk management concept specific to financial services

extracted_term.definition: Adherence to banking regulations including BSA/AML, OFAC, PCI DSS, and data protection laws

target_term.definition: Systematic approach to tracking, documenting, and managing changes to requirements and project scope

alignment_result.notes: Both involve systematic adherence to standards, but different domains (regulatory vs change control)

extracted_term.definition: System uptime of 99.99% with maximum 15-minute recovery time and 30-second data loss tolerance

alignment_result.notes: Operations and reliability concept not present in skill development domain

extracted_term.definition: Architecture pattern maintaining complete audit trails of all transaction state changes

alignment_result.notes: Technical architecture pattern not referenced in existing vocabulary

similarities: Both involve systematic evaluation against predefined criteria
Both require rapid decision-making within time constraints
Both generate authoritative results affecting subsequent actions
differences: Transaction authorization is automated vs manual skills assessment
process_alignments.notes: Interesting parallel in evaluation patterns but different operational contexts

architectural_patterns.analysis: Both use modular, loosely-coupled approaches but in different domains
Both leverage AI/ML capabilities but for different functional purposes

integration_recommendations.recommendation: Create new banking transaction domain model as separate domain
integration_recommendations.rationale: Banking transaction processing is orthogonal to skill development - minimal overlap justifies separate domain treatment
integration_recommendations.implementation: Establish new orgModel section for Financial Services domain

integration_recommendations.recommendation: Extract common AI/ML patterns for organizational reuse
integration_recommendations.rationale: Both domains use AI/ML capabilities - patterns can be generalized for cross-domain application
integration_recommendations.implementation: Create shared AI/ML architectural patterns library

integration_recommendations.rationale: Prevent terminology conflicts between different business domains within organization
Organization may need to integrate across multiple business domains in future projects
integration_recommendations.implementation: Create integration patterns and guidelines for cross-domain scenarios

organizational_impact.domain_expansion: Introduces new Financial Services domain alongside existing Skill Development domain
organizational_impact.vocabulary_growth: Adds 30+ new domain-specific terms to organizational vocabulary
organizational_impact.architectural_diversity: Adds event-driven microservices patterns alongside existing process-driven patterns
organizational_impact.skill_requirements: Team will need banking domain expertise for effective implementation
organizational_impact.governance_implications: May require separate governance approaches for regulatory compliance vs learning compliance
